body_html: There are no conda packages for magma and mkl, that are required by README installation description. Magma can probably just be omitted, but you'd need some CPU blas library instead of mkl.
body_text: There are no conda packages for magma and mkl, that are required by README installation description. Magma can probably just be omitted, but you'd need some CPU blas library instead of mkl.
body: There are no conda packages for magma and mkl, that are required by README installation description. Magma can probably just be omitted, but you'd need some CPU blas library instead of mkl.
